content.title: Factory status May 2024 (TPM/Eng)
content.visibleText:
Factory status April 2024 (TPM/Eng)

Summary

Slot Delivery
In numbers:
15 commit goals: 5 completed, 7 on track, 2 off track (of which, one is at high risk)
7 stretch goals: 2 deprioritized, 3 on track, 2 off track
8 new goals (added during Q2): 1 completed, 3 on track, 4 off track (of which, two are at high risk)
What went well:
Responded well to changing BU priorities - took over and made progress on many new goals
Did much better in meeting commitments - we will deliver all but one of the Commit goals
Turned around the Messenger slot - delivered more than planned
What did not go well:
Customer adoption is low and remains low (details below)

Maintenance
Maintenance had a great month. We have already delivered 88% of our Q2 orders (goal: 20 tickets) and we are on track to overhaul for all BUs.
We removed 62% of our backlog in Q2 so far and are on track to eliminate our backlog in Q2.
You can find the delivery scorecard and the burndown charts at the bottom of the document.

Early Customer Adoption
PMs hired in April were assigned to 3 BUs (Ignite, Jigsaw, Influitive). We made progress, but results what we would have wanted and usage/activity remains low:
Messenger: of 20 customers, 4 customers showed interest, none has concrete upgrade plans yet to wait until the new version is proven stable
We want to cut the number down is a problem in itself
Jive Cloud AI Copilot: 2 customers are actively using it, 7 have it enabled, most have it disabled
Influitive AI Feature: 2 customers started recently, 7

Improvements
We are fixing this by defining the service
TPM Slot - Early Adoption Service
Other topics

content.title: Factory status May 2024 (TPM/Eng)
content.layoutDescription: Document layout with headings and bullet points
content.visibleText:
Summary
Kanban Slots
Jigsaw (1 slot)
IgniteTech #1: Security
IgniteTech #2: Copilot
IgniteTech Maintenance
GFI (1 slot)
Influitive (2 slots)
Stratifyd (1 slot)
Crossover (1 slot)
Applied AI (1 slot)
Telco (3 slots + 1 Ops slot)
TPM only slots (1 slot)
Maintenance Delivery scorecard
Burndown charts - road to zero...
All BUs
IgniteTech
CopperTree
Jigsaw
Influitive
 Use AI to create engaging challenges for PostBeyond
DONE
OFF TRACK (10%)
ON TRACK (80%)
OFF TRACK (60%)
Next Steps:
Enable AI for communities
Achieved:
Implementation completed, is currently in testing phase before being released
We are tracking AI usage analytics on this feature
Next Steps:
Release to customers
Achieved:
Utilizing CNU to perform analysis on past challenges
Challenges:
Teams have different exposures, e.g., PepsiCo had more challenges completed (by IBM which uses the platforms as an LMS) making it hard to identify patterns. Could be a great source of insights, if it were available.
Next Steps:
Improve the AI content generation
Achieved:
Linkedin sharing restored for PostBeyond.
Facebook and LinkedIn app access control regained for PostBeyond.
Challenges:
This was not a planned commitment when the quarter started, but we had to prioritize functionality and legal issues.
Next Steps:
Complete Facebook API and Android SDK upgrade so we do not lose functionality
Achieved:
Security fix for videos completed (AWS issue - this was a failed delivery from prior quarter).
Challenges:
Security issue for publicly accessible avatar images from common discussion is a complete Disclosure upgrade
Next Steps:
Fix security issues for publicly accessible avatar images and limiting the types of files which can be uploaded by the users.
Disclosure update has consumed longer than anticipated time. We chose to start work on this earlier in the quarter.
Overall Reflection
Getting Discourse updated has consumed longer than anticipated time. We chose to start work on this earlier in the quarter.

activitySummary: The user is engaged in a Zoom meeting, as evidenced by the screenshots showing a video call with two participants, Jozef Capovics and Dragos Nuta. The meeting appears to be ongoing, with the user actively participating in the discussion. The Zoom interface shows typical video call controls such as mute, stop video, security, share screen, and more. The meeting duration is visible, indicating that the user has been in the meeting for a significant amount of time.

The user is also working on a Google Docs document titled 'Factory status May 2024 (TPM/Eng)'. The document contains detailed information about various project statuses, including slot delivery, maintenance, and early customer adoption. The user is likely reviewing and possibly updating the document, as the content includes specific metrics, achievements, challenges, and next steps for different projects. The document is structured with headings, bullet points, and tables, indicating a comprehensive report.

In addition to the Zoom meeting and Google Docs activity, the user has a notification from Google Calendar for a 'Product Daily Check-in' scheduled from 13:30 to 14:00. This suggests that the user is managing their schedule and preparing for upcoming meetings. The notification includes options to snooze or close, indicating that the user is aware of the upcoming event and can choose to address it later.

The user is interacting with an AI tool within the Chrome browser, specifically on a page titled 'AI Assist'. The AI tool, identified as 'My-GPT40', is configured to assist the user based on their email. The conversation with the AI includes setting up the email and preparing to chat with the AI assistant. This indicates that the user is leveraging AI for assistance, possibly for tasks related to their work or the ongoing meeting.
aiUseSummary: The user utilizes an AI tool named 'My-GPT40' within the Chrome browser for assistance. The AI tool is configured based on the user's email, and the conversation includes setting up the email and preparing to chat with the AI assistant. This suggests that the user is leveraging AI for support in their workflow, potentially for tasks related to their work or the ongoing Zoom meeting. The AI tool's presence indicates an effort to enhance productivity and efficiency through AI-driven assistance.
